summary: adds a book called conjure the elements.
descriptionHtml:
this mod adds a book to the game called Conjure the elements. It is a expert level conjuration spell and will need about 300 magicka to cast it. this is a basic mod that will allow you to conjure all the atronach,s in the game plus a little something else i have added in. The book can be found in Dragons bridge, in the four shields tavern, look at the images to find its exact location. 

........................................

Requirements 

you will need a mod that is able to cheat the summoning system, i will give a link to show an example of one. 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16394//?
author: K9Z
